1 FARM_RADIO_1 - Do you work on a farm with animals, fish, seafood, or insects?
1A1 FARM_RADIO_1A1 - In the last working week, did you work on a farm with animals or birds?
1A1A1 FARM_CHECK_1A1A1 - In the last working week, which animals did you come in contact with at work?
1A1A1D1 FARM_RADIO_1A1A1D1 - In the last working week, did you work with horses on sand?
1A1A1D1A1 FARM_RADIO_1A1A1D1A1 - How often was the sand wet when you worked with the horses on it?
1A1A3 FARM_RADIO_1A1A3 - In the last working week, did you handle or come in contact with animal bedding?
RADIO_1A1A3A1_1 - In the last working week, did you handle or come in contact with animal bedding?
CHECK_1A1A3A1_1A1 - Which of the following types of animal bedding did you handle or come in contact with in the last working week?
1A1A4 FARM_RADIO_1A1A4 - In the last working week, did you fumigate or spray crops with formaldehyde?
1A1A5 FARM_RADIO_1A1A5 - In the last working week, did you herd or gather in the livestock?
1A1A5A1 FARM_RADIO_1A1A5A1 - Was the soil sandy where you herded or gathered in the livestock?
if jobcat1 = 1 or jobcat5 = 192 or jobcat8 = 7 or jobcat8 = 32
RADIO_2_1 - In the last twelve months, did you come in contact with herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, rodenticides, or fumigants?
RADIO_2_1A1 - In the last working week, did you mix, load or apply any herbicides, weed killers or insecticides?
RADIO_2_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you mix herbicides, weed killers or insecticides with petrol?
RADIO_2_1A1A2 - In the last working week, did you use herbicides or insecticides containing ethylene oxide?
CHECK_2_1A1A3 - Where did you mix, load or apply any herbicides, weed killers or insecticides in the last working week?
CHECK_2_1A1A3A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aPES_1A1A3A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aPES_1A1A3A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aPES_1A1A3A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aPES_1A1A3A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aPES_1A1A3A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aPES_1A1A3A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
RADIO_2_1A1A4 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection while mixing, loading or applying herbicides or insecticides?
CHECK_2_1A1A4A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aPES_1A1A4A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aPES_1A1A4A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aPES_1A1A4A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
RADIO_2_1A1A5 - In the last working week, what clothing did you wear when mixing or applying herbicides or insecticides?
aPES_1A1A5F Shirts or t-shirts with sleeves (6)
RADIO_2_1A2 - In the last working week, did you apply fumigants to kill pests on stored crops?
CHECK_2_1A2A1 - What fumigants did you apply or mix in the last working week?
RADIO_2_1A2A2 - In the last working week, did you enter the area during fumigation and/or before the area was declared safe?
RADIO_2_1A2A2A1 - Were you wearing an air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) when you entered the area?
RADIO_2_1A2A3 - In the last working week, was the fumigation area always sealed from other areas?

RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you use cutting or cooling oils?
CHECK_4_1A1 - What types of cutting or cooling oils did you use? (May also be referred to as lubricating or machine oils or fluids.)
aCTO_1A1A Straight cutting oils (clear and feels oily) (1)
aCTO_1A1B Soluble cutting oils (milky white and feels watery) (2)
aCTO_1A1C Semi-synthetic cutting oils (forms a semi-transparent fluid when mixed with water) (3)
aCTO_1A1D Synthetic oils which are water soluble (forms a clear fluid when mixed with water) (4)

1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials)

CHECK_10_1A1B1 - Which of the following asbestos-containing materials did you remove?
aASR_1A1B1A Fibro (fibrous cement) sheet (external cladding, roofing, pipes, internal wet-area lining sheets) (1)
aASR_1A1B1B Asbestos cavity insulation (from wall or ceiling cavities in buildings) (2)
aASR_1A1B1C Fire rated board or millboard (3)
aASR_1A1B1E Any asbestos-containing material from onboard a ship, train or other mobile plant (5)
aASR_1A1B1F Lagging/insulation from boilers/ovens/furnaces or similar fixed plant (6)
aASR_1A1B1H Road paving or asphalt containing asbestos (8)
CHECK_10_1A1B2 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following methods to remove the asbestos containing materials?
aASR_1A1B2B Saturation and water injection method (2)
aASR_1A1B2D Hammering or using power tools (e.g. disc cutters, saws, etc) (4)

aASR_1A1B8A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (FFP3 type) (4)
